p: Viral RNA was extracted from 140 μL of serum using a QIAamp ® Viral RNA Mini kit and spin protocol (Cat. No. 52904). Real Time RT-PCR assay (Multiplex) was performed for detection of DENV 1–4 serotypes. For conventional PCR, cDNA was prepared using ProtoScript ® First Strand cDNA Synthesis Kit (Cat. No. E6300S) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
